title: (x) Dean & Deluca logo sans w/ tiny serifs - Copperplate Gothic {Naoise Ó Conchubhair}
content:
Hey:o)

Can anyone tell me what font Dean and Deluce use for their identity?

Thanks a million!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130207035702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ddlogo_3415.jpg)
author: amyloo

comments.content: Its [Copperplate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130207035702/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/copperplate_gothic_31_bc/?sample_text=DEAN%20%26%20DELUCA) although the ampersand has been tweaked a small bit.
The Copperplate Gothic ampersand always looks as if it is about to bite the word on the right. This tweaking looks as if it is trying to do gymnastics.
